*Kit grins and hops off, transforming back to her beast mode. She stands up on her hind legs and looks at the great view they had from the vantage point. She also checks the sun to see how much time they had of the day left*

"Suns going down, but we might as well keep travelling to earn time" *She says, and starts walking again. Her stomach growls..*

"You hungry?" *She asks*

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 19, 2000 12:06:51 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"It better be," Pegasus grunted.  "I've had this thing ever since I can
remember.  Which, actually, isn't long."  With one last thrust, Pegasus
pulled the two of them up to the top.

"Last stop, everybody out," he joked.
----- Original Message -----
From: Teltoli SilverFlight <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 7:08 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> *Kit grunts in acknowledgment, and yelps as the vibrations travels right
through her*
>
> "Wow, that horn thing is real strong! I'm almost wishing I had one now!"
*She giggled, and waited for him to reach the end so they could keep
travelling north*
